繰上がり: (くりあがり) - increase in digit (e.g. if we add 2 to the number 9)

繰下がる: (くりさがる) - (ant: 繰り上がる・くりあがる・1) to be moved back (e.g. date, rank, order)/to be postponed; to be borrowed (of a number in subtraction)
